maqras.text: 76|19|Va hamvora navcavonone covidona ʙar girdason mecarxand, ki har goh onhoro ʙuʙini, gumon mekuni, ki marvoridi parokanda hastand
76|20|Va cun [ʙa har samte] ʙingari, on co ne'mati ʙisjor va farmonravoii azime meʙini
76|21|Bar onon [ʙihistijon] liʙoshoe saʙzrang az deʙoi nozuk va deʙoi zaxim [pusonida suda]- ast va ʙo dastʙandhoe az nuqra orosta sudaand va Parvardigorason saroʙi pok ʙa eson menusonad
76|22|[Va ʙa onho gufta mesavad] «In [ne'matho] podosi sumost va [ʙidoned, ki] az sa'ju kusisi sumo qadrdoni sudaast»
76|23|[Ej pajomʙar] Jaqinan, Mo Qur'onro ʙar tu tadrican nozil kardem
76|24|Pas, ʙar hukmi Parvardigorat sikeʙo ʙos va az hec kadom az gunahgoron va ʙedinonason farmon maʙar
76|25|Va suʙhu som nomi Parvardigoratro jod kun
76|26|Va [niz] ʙaxse az saʙ ʙarojas sacda kun [va namoz ʙiguzor] va dar ʙaxsi ʙalande az saʙ [qismati darozi saʙ, ki hama dar xoʙand] Uro tasʙeh guj
76|27|Be gumon, inon [kofiron] dunjoi zudguzarro dust medorand va ruzi saxte [-ro, ki dar pes dorand] pusti sari xud raho mekunand [va ʙa on ahamijat namedihand]
76|28|Mo onhoro ofaridem va pajvandi vucudasonro muhkam kardem va har zamon, ki ʙixohem, coji ononro ʙa [guruhi digare] monandason medihem
76|29|Be gumon, in jodovari [va pand] ast, pas, har kas, ki ʙixohad, rohe ʙa suji Parvardigoras ʙarguzinad
76|30|Va sumo cizero namexohed, magar in ki Alloh taolo ʙixohad. Be gumon, Alloh taolo donoi hakim ast
76|31|Har kasro, ki ʙixohad, dar rahmati xud vorid mekunad va ʙaroi sitamgoron azoʙi dardnoke omoda kardaast
77|1|Savgand ʙa faristagone, ki pajopaj firistoda mesavand
77|2|Hamcun tundʙod meravand
77|3|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki [aʙrhoro] parokanda mekunand
77|4|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki cudokunandai [haq az ʙotil] hastand
77|5|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki vahj [-i ilohi]-ro [ʙa pajomʙaron] ilqo mekunand
77|6|Baroi itmomi huccat, ʙaroi ʙim va husdor
77|7|Be gumon, on ci ʙa sumo va'da doda mesavad, voqe' xohad sud
77|8|Pas, on goh ki sitoragon tira [va mahv] savad
77|9|Va on goh ki osmon sikofta savad
77|10|Va on goh ki kuhho [az co kanda va] parokanda savad
77|11|Va on goh ki ʙaroi pajomʙaron [cihati guvohi dodan dar mavridi ummatho] vaqt ta'jin savad
77|12|In [amr] ʙaroi ci ruze ʙa ta'xir aftodaast
77|13|Baroi ruzi cudoi [va dovari]
77|14|Va tu ci doni, ki ruzi cudoi [va dovari] cist
77|15|Dar on ruz [qijomat] voj ʙar takziʙkunandagon
77|16|Ojo mo pesinijon[-i mucrim]-ro noʙud nakardem
77|17|Sipas digaronro dar paji onho xohem ovard
77|18|In cunin ʙo gunahgoron raftor mekunem
77|19|Dar on ruz voj ʙar takziʙkunandagon
77|20|Ojo sumoro az oʙe past [-u nociz] naofaridem
77|21|Ki sipas onro dar qarorgohe mahfuz [rahim] qaror dodem
77|22|To zamone muajjan
77|23|Pas, mo [ʙar in kor] tavono ʙudem va ci nek tavono [va qudratmand] hastem
77|24|Dar on ruz voj ʙar takziʙkunandagon
77|25|Ojo zaminro cojgohi [tacammui mardum] qaror nadodem
77|26|Ham dar holi hajot va ham margason
77|27|Va dar on kuhhoi ʙisjor ʙaland [va ustuvor] qaror dodem va oʙe sirin [va guvoro] ʙa sumo nusonidem
77|28|Dar on ruz voj ʙar takziʙkunandagon
77|29|[Ba onho gufta mesavad] «Ba suji hamon cize ʙiraved, ki pajvasta takziʙas mekarded
77|30|Biraved ʙa suji sojai [dudhoi otasi] sesoxa
77|31|Na sojaafkan [va xunuk] ast va na az [garmii] su'lahoi otas cilavgiri mekunad»
77|32|Hamono on [duzax] sarorahoe cun koxe [ʙaland] meafkanad
77|33|Gui, ki on [saroraho] suturoni zardrang hastand
77|34|Dar on ruz voj ʙar takziʙkunandagon
77|35|In [hamon] ruzest, ki suxan namegujand
77|36|Va ʙa onho icozat doda namesavad, to uzrxohi kunand
77|37|Dar on ruz, voj ʙar takziʙkunandagon
77|38|In [hamon] ruzi cudoi [va dovari] ast, ki sumo va guzastagonro gird ovardaem
77|39|Pas, agar [hila va] najrange dored, onro dar haqqi man ʙa kor gired
77|40|Dar on ruz voj ʙar takziʙkunandagon
77|41|Ba rosti, ki [dar on ruz] parhezkoron dar sojaho va [kanori] casmaho qaror dorand
77|42|Va mevahoe, ki majl dosta ʙosand
77|43|[Ba onho gufta mesavad] «Ba podosi on ci mekarded, guvoro ʙixured va ʙijosomed»
77|44|Mo in guna nakukoronro podos medihem»
77|45|Dar on ruz voj ʙar takziʙkunandagon
77|46|«[Ej kofiron, dar in dunjo] andake ʙixured va ʙahra gired, zero sumo gunahgored»
77|47|Dar on ruz voj ʙar takziʙkunandagon
77|48|Va hangome ki ʙa onho gufta savad: «[Namoz ʙiguzored va] ruku' kuned, [namoz nameguzorand va] ruku' namekunand
77|49|Dar on ruz voj ʙar takziʙkunandagon
77|50|[Agar mardum ʙa in Qur'on imon nameovarand] Pas, ʙa'd az on ʙa kadom suxan imon meovarand
